metadata.title: CVE-2024-36474 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the Compound Document BinaryFile format parser of the GNOME Project G Structured File Library (libgsf)version v1.14.52. A specially crafted file can result in an integeroverflow when processing the directory from the file that allows for anout-of-bounds index to be used when reading and writing to an array. Thiscan lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a maliciousfile to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libgsf package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
